aic2025.user

Class UnitInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • aic2025.user.UnitInfo

  • public class UnitInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with the information of a given unit at a given timestamp. Note that the values are immutable, and thus they don't update over time. For example if an unit loses oxygen, any UnitInfo associated to that unit will not change.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      int[][] getCarriedCraftables()
      Returns the craftables carried by this unit (position [i][j] contains the number of craftables of type i with upgrade j).

      Returns the materials carried by this unit.
